titleStmt.title: A letter form [sic] a gentleman in the country to his friends in London upon the subject of the penal laws and tests
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Penn by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
